biotools.summary: VisionTool is a python toolbox for pose estimation on videos containing actions. It is powered with a simple and intuititive Graphical User Interface (GUI) to allow a complete analysis from annotation to semantic features detection (e.g., joint position estimation).

bioschemas.name: VisionTool
bioschemas.summary: VisionTool is a python toolbox for pose estimation on videos containing actions. It is powered with a simple and intuititive Graphical User Interface (GUI) to allow a complete analysis from annotation to semantic features detection (e.g., joint position estimation).
